name: Mandrews Merry Miracle
description:
Mandrews Merry Miracle

Mandrew has stolen the presents in YogTowers! Complete tasks for the Yogscast crew and Toddy to make a Merry Festag!

Mandrews Merry Miracle is a platformer with 3D environments and 2D friendly faces! Complete tasks and collect presents!

Everything within was made within 48 hours!

Controls

A = Left

D = Right

W = Back

Space = Jump

E = Action

Scroll down for Download!
